title: Dress
lyrics: Our secret moments in your crowded room<BREAKER>They got no idea about me and you<BREAKER>There is an indentation in the shape of you<BREAKER>Made your mark on me, a golden tattoo

All of this silence and patience, pining in anticipation<BREAKER>My hands are shaking from holding back from you (ah, ah, ah)<BREAKER>All of this silence and patience, pining and desperately waiting<BREAKER>My hands are shaking from all this (ah, ha, ha, ha)

Say my name and everything just stops<BREAKER>I don't want you like a best friend<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off<BREAKER>Take it off<BREAKER>Carve your name into my bedpost<BREAKER>'Cause I don't want you like a best friend<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off<BREAKER>Take it off

Inescapable, I'm not even gonna try<BREAKER>And if I get burned, at least we were electrified<BREAKER>I'm spilling wine in the bathtub<BREAKER>You kiss my face and we're both drunk<BREAKER>Everyone thinks that they know us<BREAKER>But they know nothing about

All of this silence and patience, pining in anticipation<BREAKER>My hands are shaking from holding back from you (ah, ah, ah)<BREAKER>All of this silence and patience, pining and desperately waiting<BREAKER>My hands are shaking from all this (ah, ha, ha, ha)

Say my name and everything just stops<BREAKER>I don't want you like a best friend<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off<BREAKER>Take it off<BREAKER>Carve your name into my bedpost<BREAKER>'Cause I don't want you like a best friend<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off<BREAKER>Take it off<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off

Flashback when you met me<BREAKER>Your buzzcut and my hair bleached<BREAKER>Even in my worst times<BREAKER>You could see the best of me<BREAKER>Flashback to my mistakes<BREAKER>My rebounds, my earthquakes<BREAKER>Even in my worst lies<BREAKER>You saw the truth in me<BREAKER>And I woke up just in time<BREAKER>Now I wake up by your side<BREAKER>My one and only, my lifeline<BREAKER>I woke up just in time<BREAKER>Now I wake up by your side<BREAKER>My hands shake, I can't explain this ah, ha, ha, ha

Say my name and everything just stops<BREAKER>I don't want you like a best friend<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off<BREAKER>Take it off<BREAKER>Carve your name into my bedpost<BREAKER>'Cause I don't want you like a best friend<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off<BREAKER>Take it off

There is an indentation in the shape of you<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off<BREAKER>You made your mark on me, golden tattoo<BREAKER>Only bought this dress so you could take it off
